mapper.insert: insert into nursing_level (name, lplan_id, fee, description, create_by, update_by, remark) VALUES (#{name},#{planId},#{fee},#{description},#{createBy},#{updateBy},#{remark})
mapper.select: select nl.*,np.plan_name planName,np.id planId from nursing_level nl left join nursing_plan np on lplan_id=np.id where nl.id =#{id}
